name: Just A Thought (bestcolour)
description:
This is just a short prototype game I had in mind to explore a mechanic and practice my game development skills during covid 19. 

Controls 
Z/K to search for nearby mind controllable units
X/L as a contextual interact button
WASD/Arrow keys to move
Space to Jump

Objective 
Get to the end of each level by brining the slime to the torn picture.
